DOC.brief_summary: The consumption of cereals-based foods with low glycemic indexes, high micronutrients and fibers contents are highly recommended. The target of this work is to provide new solutions for cereal based foods: the knowledge and understanding on the in vivo fate will be used to define structural features to gain in foods.
DOC.brief_title: NOMAC : New Tools for Managing the Fate of Cereal Nutrients in the Gut : Effects of Amylose Content on Glycemic Index.
DOC.criteria: Healthy individual, Age between 1965 years With normal food habits with at least 2 main meals per day Non smoking Having filled the consent form BMI > 25 kg/m2, Diabetes or any illness susceptible to alter Coeliac disease Past history of intestinal diseases. Treatment susceptible of modifying glycemia. Allergy
